mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lottery.t_betting ( f_id, f_period, f_betting_time, f_lottery_id, f_project, f_odds, f_money ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{period}, #{bettingTime}, #{lotteryId}, #{project}, #{odds}, #{money} );
mapper.select: SELECT f_id, f_period, f_betting_time, f_lottery_id, f_project, f_odds, f_money from t_betting WHERE f_lottery_id = #{lotteryId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND f_period = #{period, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND f_square = #{square, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT f_lottery_id, f_period, f_project, count(f_project) as f_count FROM t_betting WHERE f_lottery_id = #{lotteryId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND f_period = #{period, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY f_project
mapper.update: UPDATE t_betting SET f_square_money = #{squareMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_square = 1, f_square_time = #{squareTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE f_id = #{bettingId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_betting SET f_square_money = #{item.squareMoney}, f_square = 1, f_square_time = #{item.squareTime} WHERE f_id = #{item.bettingId}
